SnSModeOne:

SnSModeTwo:

speedrunMode:
Speedrun:

Everyone is a crewmate. The 1st player to finish tasks wins the game. Game auto ends after {0}s
allCommandsFull:
Commands:
/r - Current mode description
/0kc, /sns, /sp - Specific mode description
/l - Shows last winner info
/kick, /ban - Bans or kicks a player by name
/ckick, /cban - Bans or kicks a player by color
